issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: TiAPI
components.description: This component is used for cross-platform API work. Specifications are most likely to use this component.

fields.description:
The iOS event includes the values "index" and "map".

The Android event omits those but includes "subtitle," "latitude" and "longitude."
fields.summary: Ti API: Map View annotation click events report different properties.

comments.body:
Also, note that the "clicksource" on iOS returns "rightButton" or "rightView," (I believe, although I've mostly seen "rightButton") while Android returns "rightPane" (and possibly in some circumstances "rightButton", but haven't seen that in testing.

I thought there was another bug filed for this, but I can't find it.
Closing ticket due to time passed and lack of progress in the past few years. Any problems, please file a new ticket.
